title: Sweet Corn Tomalito
ingredients: 2 cups frozen whole-kernel corn, thawed, divided
method: Step 1: Blend 1 cup corn kernels, water, and cornmeal in a blender or food processor just until smooth.
Step 2: Mix sugar, margarine, and masa harina together in a medium bowl until light and fluffy. Stir in blended corn mixture. Mix in remaining 1 cup corn, milk, baking powder, and salt until smooth.

Step 3: Pour tomalito batter into the top of a double boiler over simmering water, and cover tightly with aluminum foil. Steam until firm, 50 to 60 minutes, checking water level occasionally and refilling if necessary.
Step 4: Stir pudding before serving to give it a consistent texture. Serve in small scoops.
